channel.title: [562/667] illusionx | Endless Fun | Risk Area | Vanguard | Torva
channel.description:
[Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/logo.png[/img]
Endless fun, great economy, 667 mapdata, have fun forever! [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/zammyspear.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/voteshop.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/torva.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/torvaandvengeance.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/slayer.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/skeletalhorror.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/rareitems.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/pureshop.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/primal.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/nex.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/newemotes.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/loginscreen.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/dungshop.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/curses.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/corp.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/claws.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/clanchat.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/bork.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/banktabs.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/agsspecial.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/120dung.png[/img] [Img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/Illusionx/100percentuptime247.png[/img]
We hope to see you ingame! :)

item.title: [562/667] illusionx | Endless Fun | Risk Area | Vanguard | Torva
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“austin cadle, post:24, topic:417877”][quote author=kronixz link=topic=520426.msg3790569#msg3790569 date=1319254861]

damn dude… this is what you call hardwork. love it. :rolleyes:

Thank you it’s only beta, beta will be over when the following is fixed:
Picking up items, D Claw spec is fixed, when I find Sgs Bgs and ss animations, when bone hit glitch is fixed, when soulsplit stops max healing.
And then beta will be over

dude hit me up with the link, ill help you find some other things just to make sure the server is at its best. overall, i love it. You always work hard on your work.

I sent you a pm I’m adding thieving stalls to home first thing in the morning aswell as chaos altar, and prayer restore altar, going to add new vote shop as old one needs new items into it, pvp shop I may keep, also adding a npc to take you to risk and a safe pvp spot, and dungeoneering is already in beta including warped floors

wait is this a solo?
[/quote]
As in me coding alone? No I’m coding with my friend brennan (a.k.a. Nightmar3) he used to code 317’s but I taught him how to code 562’s
Well cya goin to sleep[/quote]

Read full topic
